name: eMatic
tag_list: mobile, tablets, electronics, mp3, tablet, holiday-gift, video, marketing, wireless, keyboard, android, marketshare, digital, tablet-youre-getting-children-this-holiday
overview:
We are an entry-level electronics manufacturer. We sell high quality, low cost, and durable, MP3 players, electronic tablets, and accessory kits for these products.

Combining the latest advances in portable entertainment, the Ematic FunTab Internet Tablet comes preloaded with Android 2.2, giving you access to endless apps, functionality, and entertainment! Playful colors and rubberized texture make the FunTab a kid’s best friend. The 7” color multi-touch screen allows you to browse with the swipe of a finger.

  • 7” color TFT touchscreen LCD display, 800 x 480 resolution
  • Fun colors and rubberized texture are perfect for kids
  • Android 2.2 OS 1GHz Dual Cores (600MHz + 550MHz) -Built-in 802.11b/g Wi-Fi -Internal Memory: 4GB
  • HD Video player - Supports up to 720p HD Videos -Comes loaded with Android 2.2 and a selection of pre-installed applications ready to use right away. The Android-based system gives you access to thousands of other apps, allowing you to keep up with news feeds, play games, social network, and more!
  • The included Box cloud storage app provides 5GB of free storage for all your important documents, music, and more -The included office suite allows you to open .DOC, .PDF, .PPT, and even edit .XLS files.
  • The slim design makes it easy to bring anywhere - in your bag, backpack, purse, or even in your hand!
  • Store and read thousands of eBooks, supporting the most popular formats such as TXT, LRC, PDF, HTM, and EPUB. (Does not support DRM Protected content)
  • Built-in Wi-Fi makes sure you’re connected wherever you go! Bring it to the kitchen, bedroom, cafe, bookstore, or anywhere else! -notes, lectures, or brilliant ideas you might forget!
  • The FunTab includes a built-in three-axis gyroscope. When paired with the accelerometer, it makes the FunTab capable advanced motion sensing such as user acceleration, full 3D attitude, and rotation.
  • Play music or watch videos! The 4GB flash memory stores thousands of songs and hours of video
  • Add up to an additional 32GB of memory with the built-in MicroSD card slot, giving you a total of 36GB!
  • Listen to your favorite music while browsing the internet, reading eBooks, or viewing photos!
  • Lithium-ion battery for long lasting music and video playback.
  • The FunTab supports various file formats including PDF (non-DRM Protected), e-PUB, MP3 WMA, AVI, WMV, JPEG, and more. Also acts as a flash storage device, storing any type of file for later access.
  • Compatible with Windows 7, Vista, XP, 2000, MAC OSX, and Linux
